pages.title: The Undead
pages.text: Undead mobs (zombie and skeleton variants) will give you a hard time in here. They are nearly invincible unless you know how to actually fight them.$(br)To be able to damage an Undead mob, one must break its unholy aura. This will leave a short window of time to hurt it before the aura resplenishes.$(br)You will find more information in the following pages.

pages.name: The Undead
pages.text: Some undead mobs don't even fear fire...

Here are a few ways to desecrate the Undead:$(li)Fire (Fire Stick, Fire Arrow, Flint & Steel...)$(li)Silver or Amethyst Tools$(li)Smite or Magic Edge enchantments$(li)Consecration or Instant Health potions$(li)Phantasmal Arrows, Flares, and more...
